How the site was built

This site was built using Jekyll on a computer running Ubuntu and hosted on the open source software development website GitHub.

A tutorial by Andrew Munsell was used to get the site up and running.

Most of the text was written in Markdown, which is made extrememly simple and intuitive using the online editor prose.
